casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Andre GILL Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided December 14, 2017

Lisa J. Sleele, assigned counsel, in support of the petition.

Jennifer F. Miller, deputy assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 178 Conn. App. 43, 173 A.3d 998 (2017), is denied.

KAHN, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
